\begin{equation}
H^{(4)} = \int d^3 x \frac{1}{2} \biggl[ \frac{k^2}{{\cal H}^2} \tilde{\Pi}^2 + 2 \biggl( \frac{k^2}{\cal H} - {\cal H} - 
\frac{{\cal H}'}{{\cal H}} \biggr) \tilde{\Pi} \tilde{\Psi}+ \biggl(k^2 - \frac{a''}{a}\biggr) \tilde{\Psi}^2 \biggr].
